function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interconnectedness between environmental, economic, and social sustainability","Impact":"Risk of social injustice and inequality between countries and communities","Mitigation":"Promote equitable distribution of resources and support developing economies","Technologies":"Resource management technologies, sustainable development solutions","People":"Developing countries, underdeveloped economies, marginalized communities","Owner":"International organizations, governments, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of production capabilities in underdeveloped economies","Impact":"Inability to maintain access to essential commodities and increase dependency on external support","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure and technology, capacity building, and knowledge transfer","Technologies":"Manufacturing technology, infrastructure development, knowledge sharing platforms","People":"Underdeveloped economies, local production sectors","Owner":"International development agencies, private sector investors"},{"Description":"Difficulty in working from home and lack of access to health facilities in underdeveloped regions","Impact":"Limited ability to implement remote work and lack of healthcare access","Mitigation":"Investment in digital infrastructure, telemedicine, and mobile health solutions","Technologies":"Digital connectivity, telemedicine platforms, mobile health apps","People":"Underprivileged communities, remote workers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, healthcare organizations, government"}]}
